scenes.background: [Monica] glances at you with a concerned expression while [Bob] checks his calendar.
scenes.description: 'So, when should we schedule this meeting? We need to resolve this quickly.'

options.text: Let's meet tomorrow morning. We need to act fast.
options.analysis: You suggested an immediate meeting, showing a high level of urgency and motivation but potentially lower self-regulation.

options.text: How about we take some time to gather our thoughts and meet in the afternoon?
options.analysis: You suggested a more considered approach, showing good self-regulation and balanced perception, though the urgency is less emphasized.

options.text: We should have a preliminary discussion over email first and then decide the meeting time.
options.analysis: You suggested starting with an email discussion, showing good social skills but potentially lower empathy and immediate motivation.
